code: import _classCallCheck from"/Users/alejandromurawczik/Movies/Programacion/ IronHack/Ironhack/week7/day5/BYOG/client/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from'axios';var services=function services(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,services);this.getUsers=function(){return _this.service.get('/');};this.getUserById=function(userId){return _this.service.get("/".concat(userId));};this.getProfileInfo=function(userId){return _this.service.get("/".concat(userId,"/profile-info"));};this.editUser=function(userId,theEditedUser){return _this.service.post("/".concat(userId,"/edit"),theEditedUser);};this.addFavorite=function(userId,newFavorite){return _this.service.put("/".concat(userId,"/add-favorite"),newFavorite);};this.deleteFavorite=function(userId,favId){return _this.service.delete("/".concat(userId,"/remove-favorite/").concat(favId));};this.service=axios.create({baseURL:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/users"),withCredentials:true});};export{services as default};
